name: RUN FOR YOUR LIFE (itch) (Nick_Drkulec)
description: This is the second game I made for my game design studio 1 class. A top down game where you must run from a growing number of ghosts. Run For Your Life is inspired by Call of Duty Zombies, except there is no fighting back. Quick decisions must be made on the fly, then watch and learn patterns to make your next move. Can you beat my record of 225 seconds? Let me know!
